lines.text: One wish per customer and no wishes for more wishes. They plugged that loophole up years ago. In past years there were abuses.
Everything is fine. No, nothing is wrong. Hortense... is flat.
How DARE you mock me?

[in a mocking voice]
How DARE you mock me?
Cut it Out!
Cut it...!
[before he could finish Claudia grabs his throat]

[officer leaves Murray in between the bars]
Officer! Wait! Are you going to get a donut?
Good evening!
No, Claudia, No! You really shouldn't be here. You can't be here.
Now, how can you say that I can't be here when I already am? It's just not logical.
No, no, no!
This is my faithful companion, Boots.
Hi, hi, hi!
You know Claudia, since you left us, rumor has it that you've gone into the darkside.
Ha! A witch? Moi? Oh, you can't be serious. Do I look like a witch to you?
Well, you know, you really should leave because if Hortense was to see you here, I could lose my own wand.
No, one knows the pain of such a loss more than I. So, I'll go. But, before I do, I remembered what a healthy appetite you have. So, I brought you a little something from my gardn.
No thanks, I just had quite a bitof a... Oh, my that is the reddest apple I think I've ever seen.
Oh, it tastes even better than it looks.
Well, I...
Yummy!

[as she takes the apple and eats it]
Mmm!
Now is that the apple of a witch?
[Rena shakes her head and falls into a deep sleep]
You bet it is!
